question: 付近
sourceMnemonic: If you <kanji>attach</kanji> things <kanji>near</kanji> you, they end up being in the same <vocabulary>neighborhood</vocabulary> as you. They're attached <vocabulary>nearby</vocabulary> so they can't go much further.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You didn't learn this reading for <ja>付</ja> though, so here's a mnemonic to help you:

Your <vocabulary>neighborhood</vocabulary> is full of <reading>foo</reading>ls (<ja>ふ</ja>). Fools everywhere. You're probably one too, since you live <vocabulary>nearby</vocabulary>.
